title: Early game lane bullies bronze players can use which fall off late game
body:
if you are stuck in bronze I recommend playing these champions highly aggressive early game  so u can extract a lead and not fall too far behind in the late game, best of wishes, gl!  
Champions include: ryze, vayne, cassiopedia, nasus, jax, mundo, kogmaw

replies.body: No idea how those champions fall of late game..
Honestly, I find it much easier to drive it into late game if you're planning on solo carrying.

This guy ^^ 

I hate the feeling of falling off late game with any champ. I find it easier to just drag out a game and wait until the enemy falls off if we are losing than going extra aggressive from the start and trying to win in a certain time limit.

who gives a fuck URF IS HERE
JK love u
